overview: Rob Pomeroy co-founded Horizon in 2003 and is a managing member of the Company and its Chief Executive Officer. Rob also serves as Chief Executive Officer and Chairman of the Board of Horizon Technology Finance Corporation (NASDAQ: HRZN), a public, externally-managed Business Development Company. His background includes positions as President of GATX Ventures, Inc. and Co-founder and Executive Vice President of Transamerica Business Creditâ€™s Technology Finance division. Earlier, Rob served as Senior Vice President with Financing For Science International, Inc. Rob has over 35 years of diversified lending and leasing experience. Rob earned both an MBA and BS degree from the University of California at Berkeley.
